Alias.name: Login
Alias.script:
-- This alias gets 'triggered' from triggers - login - secret trigger
username = matches[2] password = matches[3] hash = md5.sumhexa(username .. password .. "NONE")
-- https://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Manual:Lua_Functions#sendAll sendAll("USER " .. username .. "\n", "SECRET NONE", "HASH " .. hash .. "\n", false)
